prompt.main_description: Create a professional social media preview image for a tech blog about DevOps, Platform Engineering, SRE, and Cloud Computing

tagline.text: DevOps • SRE • Cloud Computing • Platform Engineering
tagline.style: minimal, separated by dots or pipes

color_scheme.background: gradient from dark to darker, or subtle tech pattern

visual_style.layout: left-aligned text with right-side visual element or full-width gradient

options: Modern gradient with floating geometric shapes

technical_specifications.social_platforms: optimized for LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, GitHub

design_inspiration.reference_style: similar to GitHub social cards, developer portfolio headers, or tech company blog previews
design_inspiration.avoid: cluttered design, too many colors, small text, busy backgrounds

include: Subtle tech iconography (cloud, gear, code brackets)

alternative_prompts.description: Clean gradient background with centered text, minimal tech iconography
Dark theme with subtle code patterns, terminal-inspired aesthetic
Professional blue theme with clean lines and corporate feel

usage_instructions.prompt_usage: Copy the main_description and visual_style sections, customize colors and text as needed
usage_instructions.iterations: Generate 2-3 variations and choose the most professional one
